name: CharRiot Race
description:
In CharRiot Race, you are the boss! Finish your two laps as fast as possible and annihilate the other racers by shooting bullets, lasers and dropping anvils!

Controls:

WASD - movement

Left click - shoot bullets

Right click (tap once) - shoot laser

Shift - drifting

R - restart race

Made by:

Berend Driessens

Guus Knol

Dion Peek

Used assets:

Water shader - https://alexanderameye.github.io/notes/shaders-done-quick/

Horse model - https://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/low-poly-horse-3d-model-1872061
